$interpreted: Nigel: Huh...didn't think it was built this solid. Let's have another go...
Angelia: Nigel...what...what's this about?
Naya: Scoundrel, what are you trying to pull off this time?!
Nigel: Sabotage the linker, and impair the castle's ability to remain airborne. Can't you tell?
Naya: You dunce, the castle will freefall and everyone will plunge to their death!
Nigel: That was my intention from the start.
Angelia: WHAT?!
Nigel: HAH! I should give the princess some credit. If you weren't so gullible, I wouldn't have been able to sneak into the castle at all.
Angelia: You... you planned this all along? Why?
Nigel: Want to know the reason?
Nigel: THIS IS WHY!
Curly Haired Male Noble: A demihuman!
Hostile Female Noble: An inferior demihuman has intruded our castle!
Angelia: You...you are a demihuman?
Nigel: The Kingdom's folly lead to the demise of my homeland over thirty years ago.
Nigel: We could only seek refuge in the world's darkest corners, living a life with our heads hung in shame!
Curly Haired Male Noble: But most demihumans were resettled on our land!
Hostile Female Noble: That's right, you ungrateful piece of trash!
Nigel: We've been looked down on and oppressed for eternity, and we should thank you for that?
Nigel: If it wasn't for living disguised like a wolf in sheep's skin, you humans would never give me a chance at life!
Angelia: ...And so your intel organization was not to stop King Theodore, but rather to scheme a massacre while nobles were under the same royal roof...
Naya: Stupid, you will die as well!
Nigel: Drag you all down to the depths of hell, and a glorious death on my homeland Atlas.
Nigel: Not a worthy sacrifice? Over my dead body!
Theodore: Angelia, as princess of the Kingdom of the Sun, you went as far to gang up with terrorists in order to take back the throne!
Curly Haired Male Noble: Dash it all, what kind of princess are you?!
Hostile Female Noble: We're all about to die, AND IT'S ALL YOUR FAULT!
Angelia: It's not like that, I......
Nigel: Disgusting. Even at a moment like this, you humans will still point fingers at each other.
Theodore: I'm not done yet. Guards, take him and the princess!
Angelia: Nigel......
Naya: Angel, it's time to go!
Theodore: DON'T LET THEM GET AWAY!
Charle: Well...things just got interesting.
Theodore: Headmaster Ceres, could you explain your presence here?
Charle: ...I was overwhelmed and taken hostage. I had no choice but to lead him to the engine room. After that, I was knocked out cold.
Theodore: And you're asking me to believe, that an insignificant scoundrel like him could take the Rune Academy's Headmaster hostage?
Charle: Don't judge a book by its cover. That scoundrel is your most fearsome challenge to date.
Theodore: ……….
Theodore: Can you handle the situation?
Charle: Summon all sorcerers within the castle. We will infuse Soul Energy into the device,
Charle: which will slow our speed and save the lives of all onboard.
Theodore: Fine... but we still have unfinished business.
Theodore: You heard the man. Summon all sorcerers within the castle to Headmaster Ceres' command.
Theodore: Also, once the nobles have been relocated, we shall arrest the traitor, Angelia!
